text: Marit Higraff is a Norwegian invesigative journalist for NRK, the Norwegian radio and television public broadcasting company. She is best-known for co- producing the NRK and BBC World Service programme Death in Ice Valley in 2018, alongside Neil McCarthy. Higraff makes use of modern forms of journalism, mostly podcasting. She is one of the leading experts on the case of the unidentified Isdal Woman and successfully encouraged the Bergen Police to reopen the case in 2016. == References == == External links == * Marit Higraff on de Volkskrant Category:Norwegian investigative journalists Category:Norwegian journalists Category:NRK original programming Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Marit Higraff
